snippet: The Chicago Bears won four division titles and reached the Super Bowl while Jerry Angelo was the general manager. They also crumbled this season, and now Angelo is out.
abstract: NFL Roundup: Chicago Bears coach Lovie Smith retains his job despite house cleaning that ousted longtime general manager Jerry Angelo; other NFL news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Bears won four division titles and reached the Super Bowl while Jerry Angelo was the general manager. They also crumbled this season, and now Angelo is out.

headline.main: Smith Survives Housecleaning by the Bears
headline.print_headline: Smith Survives Housecleaning by the Bears
